title: Taste Like Never Before
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>What are you drinking, Chika?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, Lanzhu-chan. It’s mikan juice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Mikan juice? Is that different from orange juice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It is~. Mikan has some good things that only mikan can offer! Wanna try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Are you sure? Lanzhu shall have some then! *Gulp gulp*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>How is it? Can you feel the goodness!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>....It certainly is different from orange juice. It’s suuuuuper good! Lanzhu loves it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~. I’m glad you understand, Lanzhu-chan! There are several kinds of mikan juice too. Depending on the mikan used, it can be refreshing, sweet, or sour. Isn’t that interesting?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>They’re all mikan but have different tastes? Lanzhu wants to try drinking the others too, Chika!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay! Let’s go buy some then~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
